runs.comm: captain is gone first ball, nothing much in the delivery, widish length ball, he looks to punch-guide it from the crease but finds backward point

Dilshan takes another one at backward point, two in two, Ansar has a forgettable debut, could not control the punch-steer again off the widish length ball, a bit of a loose waft in the end, Dilshan pouching another low take at backward point
that moved back in sharply, but he had already let it alone outside off
straightish outside off now, width given, not fiddled with
gets forward this time and allows the length ball to go
a pull now, a mistimed one, gets the short ball over square leg in the end for a couple
starts full and on the pads at 140 kph, and it is put away through square leg deftly
that is a very fine leave, length ball swerving away at 142 kph outside off, he was in the crease and shouldered arms
similar delivery starting outside off this time and moving further away, also bouncing steeply
pitched up just outside off at 141 kph, defended to covers
full ball worked wide of mid on, a fumble there allows another run
length ball at 141.7 kph turned straight to shortish square leg
that swung in sharply and hit him high on the pad even as he missed the turn to square
moves in from back of a length, worked with the angle in front of square leg

madness, takes a couple of steps outside off, then lets it go, comes back to his crease, throw from the keeper dribbles to the leg side, Shehzad takes off for the overthrow, midwicket is onto the ball, now Shehzad slips, no way he is coming back, but he gets up, turns and scrambles back, but wait, he's lost his bat, but he still dives, stretches out the hands as much as possible, after all that, the throw misses
cut away wide of third man for a tight couple of runs, a short run is signalled
gets front foot across, gets bat around it, and turns the length ball to midwicket
punched to covers
drives a pitched up ball without power to extra cover
lovely delivery, held its line after being angled in from wide of the crease, swung away just before pitching, he is beaten as he pushes inside the line
now has a waft at a widish one outside off, beaten again

Mahela is celebrating after taking the ball at slip, did the outside edge carry? batsman pushing uncertainly forward to a length ball straightening outside off, thick edge goes low to Mahela, seemed to bounce before settling into his palms, did that bounce off the fingers or the ground is the question, replays are not exactly conclusive
cannot connect as he looks to flick one full and into the pads, rolls away fine down leg

this time there is no doubt, Sanga has pulled off a stunner diving to his right, Latif going for a big drive to a full one that moved away a bit, Mahela appeals, for the fun of it, even as Sanga tumbles down with the ball safe in his gloves
pushed down to mid off
too far wide down the leg side and Sanga has no chance
works a length ball to midwicket
length ball on off defended back to the bowler softly
gets bat around pad to drive a pitched up ball from leg to mid on
has an awkward swing at this length ball coming in, gets it away through square leg in the end
swinging away very full, he digs it out from just outside off to the bowler
pitches it up full on to the stumps again, driven to mid on
covers for the slight away movement on this fullish one and defends towards cover
this one seems to go straight on, full again, inside edge goes to midwicket
tight stuff, full again, right on off stump, with three men down, Malik is not going for the drives, defended
this time he reaches out to a wide one and squeezes it wide of third man for a couple
126.9 kph but awkward bounce right away, he is surprised as he pushes at it, but the edge is wide of point, to third man
wild swing, the angle and initial swing was taking it down the leg side already, and then it swung further and further away from a helpless Sanga

thick outside edge, dropped at wide slip by Angelo, it would have been a straightforward take for first slip, Malik playing a very loose drive to a length ball, Angelo dived to his left, got to the ball, but it popped out
shortish one pulled without too much power, and with control, wide of deep square
another couple of runs, worked awkwardly towards midwicket, and the man in the deep has too much to do to prevent the second
cut wide of sweeper cover
that comes in and is fended to the leg side behind square, they are thinking of two again, but this time have to be happy with one
pitched up and moving away a bit, pushed to mid off
worked down the pitch to the bowler
holding its line outside off, pitched up again, thick edge to third man as he pushes softly at it
looking to get across and outside off, Angelo bowls it on a good length now, and he does not have the room to work it away
angled in towards middle and leg now, whipped straight to mid on
another thick edge as he looks to drive a fullish ball, scurries to point
pushed through and hits him on the pad, Sanga appeals, so does the bowler, going down leg, says the umpire, also an inside edge
flat and fullish on middle, blocked
worked to fine leg for a single
dabbed wide of short third man, Malinga cannot stop it with a dive, Chandimal gives chase and stops it
that will go, short and flat, he opens up and drags the pull hard over midwicket and into the gap
plays out a back of a length ball to point

that is an outstanding catch, just incredible, Perera running across from third man, diving full-length to his right and taking the slash off a wide one from Malik even as he is parallel to the ground in the air
drives a pitched up ball down to long off
still getting the ball to hold its line just outside off, driven to mid off

just wide of the man at mid on, Chandimal, Akmal not in control of the pull as he drags it from well outside off, Chandimal was a tad slow in getting to his right at mid on, and the ball bounced just in front and raced away past him
left alone outside off
flat and shortish, punched straight to extra cover

Sanga appeals for a stumping down the leg side off a wide ball, batsman's back foot seems to be fine, just about, on the side angle, but it looks much closer on the back view, benefit of doubt goes to batsman in the end
that hardly got up, it was floated down the leg side, and kept low to beat Sanga, pulled back just inside the boundary
making room but this one is angled in to him, plays it down to long on
thick inside edge behind square as he works a flighted ball
reaches out and turns it straight to midwicket
moves forward to this fullish one just outside off and pushes to mid off
gets forward and defends a tossed up ball
dabs a wide ball late and very fine to the third man rope, shortish delivery it was, not much turn
moves forward and punches a flighted ball to long off now
Shehzad tries to dab to third man as well, but is beaten
pushed with the spin to  long on
spins in and turned to square leg
opens the face and runs it behind point, just out of the reach of a diving Dilshan at backward point
Akmal has given it away, he went to pull Malinga, the ball got big on him and Kula took the top edge safely at mid off after taking some time to judge it and set himself up
Dilshan saves the single, with a run and a dive to his left at backward point
driven in the air, not in control, over extra cover, and down to sweeper cover
away with a steer to third man off a sharp back of a length ball
he's gone second ball, the offspinner has struck, big celebrations, Afridi charged out immediately to a flighted ball, had a huge heave, and the thick edge was taken by a leaping short third man
works a full ball through midwicket

nothing working for Pakistan, they find new ways to get out, confusion this time, Shehzad wanted the single as he worked it square on leg, Tanvir was not so keen, Shehzad had almost reached the other end  before Tanvir crossed over to sacrifice his wicket
flighted ball blocked off the front foot
starts it on middle and leg, and it spins down the leg side, Sanga cannot collect it
turns a full ball down to long on
reaches out to a tossed up widish one and drives it to a tumbling extra cover
widish back of a length ball steered down to third man
pings the fast bowler on the helmet with the bouncer, he closed his eyes as he tried to duck, Perera takes the ball as it pops in the air
this time he gets down and out of the way of another bouncer
short again, swivels for the pull, big top edge bounces and turns away from third man, who does well to take it as it almost flies bounces past him
Dilshan saves more runs at backward point, a slower one cut to his left, he gets down to it with a dive
another one falls short of third man, Gul swings at the pitched up ball, but the ball does not carry
a clean strike for once, down the track, to the pitch, and a crisp blow over the straight rope
bowled this time, backing away to a flat and shortish one, trying to dab it to third man, missing and losing his bails
full ball nudged to midwicket
pushes forward to one outside off and defends
moves across and turns it through square leg
down the track and drags it to deep midwicket
pushed to cover
deep midwicket almost overran the ball as he came in from the rope but then stopped and took the ball as it came down, Gul had tried to push at the slower one but hit it high in the air
going for the yorker, not quite there, played out to the off side
full toss nudged to deep square
Chandimal runs in from fine leg but cannot get to the ball even as he falls forward, another top edge, off a hook this time
slogged from outside off to wide long on
that has been slammed straight back at the bowler, who gets a hand to it and regrets it as he winces in pain, the ball rolls down the ground
smack! Ajmal swings from just outside off and gets it down to the cow corner rope
swing and a miss outside off this time
that will be the end of that, Ajmal gets an edge through to Sanga as he backs away and a has a heave to a back of a length ball
